message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  This is a great price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $13,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while still allowing me to save some money.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This price reflects the value of the product and gives us both a fair outcome.  What do you say?
